casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Andrew Clayton LEDBETTER. No. 426P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. David M. Black, Lincolnton, for Ledbetter, Andrew Clayton. Richard A. Graham, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. E. Burke Haywood, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of January 2016 by State of NC to Deem Response Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
